title: "Wait, not like that": Free and open access in the age of generative AI
author: Molly White
content: The visions of the open access movement have inspired countless people to contribute their work to the commons: a world where ‚Äúevery single human being can freely share in the sum of all knowledge‚Äù (Wikimedia), and where ‚Äúeducation, culture, and science are equitably shared as a means to benefit humanity‚Äù (Creative Commons).

title: Everyone is illiterate now (conference reviewing rant)
author: Lizzie Kumar
content: I feel the urge to start by saying I consider myself to be generally off the ‚ÄúAI+Society‚Äù beat, to the extent that I was ever on it.

title: üåª AI friends too cheap to meter
author: Jasmine Sun
content: We passed the Turing Test years ago and not enough of us are talking about it.
